Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Tile

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Tile
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class Tile
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable
Class used to represent the single Tile of the Board.

Each Tile can host only one worker. Any worker can build on a Tile except on particular conditions set by a God.

On a single Tile can be built : level-1 block, level-2 block, level-3 block or a dome. Level-0 is ground level.

All the Tiles are level-0 at the start of the game.

Since:
1.0
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addBlockLevel()
    Adds 1 to the block level variable of the tile after a worker has built a block on the Tile.
    boolean availableToBuild​(Tile dest)
    Checks if it's possible to "build" in the parameter Tile, standing on the current one.
    boolean availableToMove​(Tile dest)
    Checks if it's possible to "move" from the current Tile to the parameter Tile.

    Changes to True the variable DomePresence after a worker has built a dome on the Tile.
    void freeWorker()
    Changes to False the variable OccupiedByWorker after a worker has moved out the Tile.
